name: hidden folders
description: Matches a file path that contains a hidden folder, like: "\.git" or "\__MAC_OSX".
content:
hallo/.git/hjhsjhs
ahjahallo/.git/hjhsjhs
ahjahallo/__MAC_OSX/hjhsjhs
ahjahallo/.DS-Store/hjhsjhs
ahjahallo/git/hjhsjhs
ahjahallo/--git/hjhsjhs
ahjahallo/1_git/hjhsjhs
ahjahallo/.1_git/hjhsjhs
author: Florian Zinggeler
